class PyAutoExcel.Engines.Writers.OpenpyxlWriter

Bases: ListGridWriteBook

save_file(file_name: str)

Abstract method to save the workbook data to a file.

Parameters:

file_name – The name of the file to save the workbook data to.

save_io(file_name: str)

Save the workbook data to an IO stream.

Parameters:

file – The IO stream to save the workbook data to.
